**Cal Teach — Math Teaching Assistant, Los Angeles, CA**
*Dec. 2024 – Jun. 2025*
[Program Website](https://communitypartnerships.ucla.edu/program/california-teach/)

* Supported instruction in high school Statistics and Calculus classrooms by assisting with lesson delivery and offering individualized student support
* Guided students through challenging mathematical concepts using one-on-one tutoring and small-group learning sessions
* Created and graded practice assignments aligned with Common Core standards to strengthen understanding and improve test readiness
* Worked with mentor teachers to review student performance data and adjust lesson plans and teaching strategies accordingly
